entry.title: Mesogan
entry.summary: I can finally share our CGF paper MesoGAN! We train a 3D GAN with a novel representation to allow generation of arbitrary extent 3D textures. We use these textures with shell mapping to create the appearance of mesoscale materials like fur or grass. More: https://t.co/BCLIXh0Am4 pic.twitter.com/T3cSWHk3TS— Stavros Diolatzis (@StavrosDiol) May 25, 2023
